class.name: SQLiteDatabase
class.brief_description: Manages SQLite database connections and operations.
class.description: The SQLiteDatabase class provides functionalities to create, access, and manage SQLite databases within the Godot engine. It allows for executing SQL queries, managing resources, and handling database connections efficiently.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new instance of SQLiteDatabase, initializing the specified database file.

method.name: get_sqlite
method.description: Returns the underlying SQLite object for executing queries and operations.

method.name: set_resource
method.description: Sets the resource path for the SQLite database file.
